actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-422.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 777.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the House.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 101-777.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 486.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
The chair announced that a second on the motion to suspend the rules is not required.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Private Law No: 101-8.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Stone County, Arkansas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States to certain lands in Stone County, Arkansas, to any person claiming deprivation by the United States of title to such land, provided certain defined conditions are met.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the relief of certain persons in Stone County, Arkansas deprived of property as a result of a 1973 dependent resurvey by the Bureau of Land Management.
A bill to provide for the conveyance of lands to certain individuals in Stone County, Arkansas.
